p: All these vaccines are attenuated viral vaccines that replicate within the host to induce protective immunity. The World Health Organization recommends the first dose to be given at 12 months and the second dose at 15 to 18 months [ 80]; the CDC-recommended schedule in the United States is to administer the first dose at age 12 to 15 months and the second dose at age 4 to 6 years [ 81].
